mutants.mutated_line: last_day = calendar.monthrange(year, month)[2]
mutants.code:
import calendar
import datetime

def count_weekdays_in_month(year, month, holidays):
    last_day = calendar.monthrange(year, month)[2]
    weekdays = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]
    num_weekdays = len([1 for day in range(1, last_day + 1) if calendar.weekday(year, month, day) in weekdays])
    for holiday in holidays:
        holiday_date = datetime.datetime.strptime(holiday, '%Y-%m-%d').date()
        if holiday_date.year == year and holiday_date.month == month and (holiday_date.weekday() in weekdays):
            num_weekdays -= 1
    return num_weekdays

import calendar
import datetime

def count_weekdays_in_month(year, month, holidays):
    last_day = calendar.monthrange(year, month)[1]
    weekdays = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4]
    num_weekdays = len([1 for day in range(1, last_day + -1) if calendar.weekday(year, month, day) in weekdays])
    for holiday in holidays:
        holiday_date = datetime.datetime.strptime(holiday, '%Y-%m-%d').date()
        if holiday_date.year == year and holiday_date.month == month and (holiday_date.weekday() in weekdays):
            num_weekdays -= 1
    return num_weekdays
